channel.title: BSR RADIO Events
channel.itunes:subtitle: Streaming the Rhythms of Black music around the world
channel.itunes:author: Marjorie Dibou

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show w/DJ DIBOU - April 24, 2012
item.description:
Recorded on April 24, 2012 at Forbidden Lovers Lounge. "THE MEN OF SOUL" Kem, Eric Roberson, Stokely Williams, Robert Glasper, Maxwell, Musiq Soulchild, Dwele, R Kelly, D'Angelo ... and of course some "Celebrity News"!

DJ DIBOU
Charity Richez, Hostess
Gutta Luckless, owner Forbidden Lovers Lounge

PLAYLIST:
001 September - Earth, Wind & Fire
002 I Don't Believe You Want To Get Up And Dance (Oops, Up Side Your Head) - The Gap Band 
003 Try Love - Eric Roberson
004 Fast Lane - Bilal
005 If You Want Me To Stay (LP Version) - Eric Benét
006 Purple Haze - Robert Randolph & The Family Band
007 I Turned You On - The Isley Brothers
008 Fire - Ohio Players
009 Its A Mans World - James Brown
010 Jam Knock - Brian McKnight
011 Bed Is Listening - Jaheim
012 June 28th (I'm Single) - Ruben Studdard
013 Be Here - D'Angelo 
014 50 Ways To Leave Your Lover (feat. Roiger) - PPP
015 Where The Party At (LP Mix featuring Nelly) - Jagged Edge featuring Nelly
016 Why Do We Try - Ali Shaheed Muhammad & Mint Condition
017 Why Do We Try (Feat. Stokley) - Robert Glasper Featuring Stokley
018 Love You - Maxwell
019 Anything (Feat. Swizz Beatz) - Musiq
020 Wake Up Mr. West - Kanye West 
021 If I Gave You Soul (What Would You Do With It?) - Public Enemy
022 How Do You Want It - 2pac 
023 Stressed Out - A Tribe Called Quest featuring Faith Evans
024 I Love You Remix - Mary J Blige ft Smif N Wessun
025 Purple House - Prince
026 Tonight (Best You Ever Had) [Explicit] - John Legend ft. Ludacris
027 Open Your Eyes - Dwele
028 Open Your Eyes - Bobby Caldwell
029 Calling Me - Raheem Devaughn
030 Share My Love - R. Kelly
031 Share My Life - Kem
032 If This World Were Mine (Duet with Cheryl Lynn) - Luther Vandross

:::::::Celebrity News Brought to You By The YBF.com:::::::

Think Like A Man" #1 At Box Office, Wins With $33M In Ticket Sales

Brian McKnight RESPONDS To The Critics Of His X-Rated "If You're Ready To Learn" Song

Kim & Kanye's Hand Holding & Canoodling Date With LaLa & Carmelo--And The Entire Kardashian Clan--In NYC

 

::::::NEW MUSIC COMING SOON:::::: Find A Way by Kenny Lattimore

 

::::::::STAY IN CONTACT WITH BSR RADIO:::::::

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show w/DJ DIBOU - March 13, 2012
item.description:
Recorded at Gallery Galli on March 13, 2012 .::.  NuSoul NeoSoul with DJ DIBOU at Gallery Galli.  NEW MUSIC TUESDAY Bobby Womack, Nneka, Usher, Chris Brown, Estelle ... and Robert Glasper.  Come hear your favorite neosoul tunes ... support these independent artists!

PLAYLIST

001 Hip Hop, Be Bop Hip Hop Don't Stop - Man Parrish 
002 Please Forgive My Heart  - Bobby Womack
003 You Were Meant For Me - Lalah Hathaway
004 Ah Yeah - Robert Glasper Featuring Musiq Soulchild and Chrisette Michele
005 I Need Love Ledisi
006 In The Morning - Mary J. Blige 
007 Knowingness - Leon King
008 Mister Nice Guy - Eric Roberson
009 Wondering Why? (You Don't Talk To Me) - Jill Scott
010 Why Do We Try - Robert Glasper Featuring Stokley
011 My Everything Lalah Hathaway
012 All In My Head Avery Sunshine
013 Those Who Wait - Daley
014 Life In Marvelous Times - Mos Def 
015 Soul Is Heavy - Nneka
016 Sleep - The Roots
017 Black Radio - Robert Glasper Featuring yasiin bey
018 Thank You - Estelle
019 Hooked On You (LP Version) - Silk
020 Dodgin' Your Phone - Dwele feat. David Banner
021 CoSign - SWV
022 Real Talk - Dave Hollister
023 Always Shine - Robert Glasper Featuring Lupe Fiasco and Bilal
024 Ah Yeah - Robert Glasper Featuring Musiq Soulchild and Chrisette Michele
025 Hey BoY - Hil St. Soul 
026 Climax - Usher
027 Turn Up The Music - Chris Brown
028 Superman (featuring Bucie) (Club Mix) - Black Coffee
029 Follow Your Heart (Heart Mix) - feat Rick Galactik

NEW CD SHOWCASE: Ruben Studdard "Letters From Birmingham"

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show w/DJ DIBOU - February 14, 2012
item.description:
HAPPY VALENTINES DAY!!  Black Soul Rhythms Radio ♡Valentines Day webcast from Bricktops on Virtual Montmartre sim. This was a truly grown sexy event celebrating BLACK HISTORY MONTH spotlighting RL Harlem in Montmartre: Charity Richez, hostess Indea Vaher, Program Admin. for Virtual Montmartre
(¯`v´¯)
`*.¸.*´¸.•´¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ .•´ ¸¸.•¨¯`•
Virtual Montmartre is the sister sim of Virtual Harlem. The University of Paris IV-Sorbonne funded the development of these sims in 2004. The relationship of Montmartre to Harlem is clear to scholars of the Jazz Age/Harlem Renaissance, for it was in that Jazz was introduced and popularized in Europe by African American troops who fought under the French flag in World War I. These prestigious sims have been cosponsored by the National Black Programming Consortium and the Government of Norway for the development of Virtual Harlem and Virtual Montmartre in Second Life. They continue to be educational sims frequently being utilized internationally by rl students, sl artists, filmakers, writers, and faculty.

Press = http://bit.ly/A5gklQ

♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥
Harlem in Montmartre The New School Lecture 1hr 19min http://youtu.be/qQ-xXA7D6YA
Ada Bricktop Smith http://www.pbs.org/wnet/gperf/episodes/harlem-in-montmartre/historian-tyler-stovall-on-bricktops/830/
♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥

PLAYLIST
001 Outta Love (4hero Remix) - Reel People
002 Love - Carmen Rodgers
003 So Beautiful - Musiq Soulchild
004 Flower Girl (Feat. Dwele) Maysa
005 ANOTHER LUVR - Teedra Moses
006 Angel Eyes - Submotion Orchestra
007 Brotha - Noñameko
008 Nothing Has Ever Felt Like Thi - Rachelle Ferrell
009 No Tears - Leela James
010 Only You - Jill Scott
011 Need You Bad - Omar
012 Beautiful U R - Javier
013 Hurts Like Hell (Album Version) - Noel Gourdin
014 You Allen Anthony
015 Blacka Da Berry - Alfonzo Hunter
016 Rush Over (Album Version) - Marcus Miller
017 Ah Yeah (Feat. Musiq Soulchild And Chrisette Michele) - Robert Glasper
018 Can I? - David Peaston
019 And I Love Him - Roberta Flack
020 It Will Be (feat. Tony Momrell) - Reel People
021 Love's Holiday - Kim Burrell
022 Side By Side - Earth, Wind & Fire
023 You Put A Move On My Heart (Feat. Jennifer Hudson)- Quincy Jones
024 My Love Is Your Love - Whitney Houston
025 Take Me as I Am - Mary J. Blige
026 When I Fall in Love - Nat King Cole

SPOTLIGHT:
The Love Album
by Kim Burrell

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show w/DJ DIBOU - January 31, 2012
item.description:
Recorded on the SugarHill Queen Yacht on January 31, 2012. New music Tuesday will showcase "Think Like A Man Soundtrack" and new music from independent artists along with your favorite neosoul, RnB and hiphop tunes ... and of course some "Celebrity News"!

Visit the links ... support these independent artists!

PLAYLIST

001 Peace Of Mind - Selah Sue
002 Take U To Somewhere - Ovall
003 Angel Eyes - Submotion Orchestra
004 Brotha - Noñameko
005 Thank You - Estelle
006 Cruisin' (Radio Edit) - D'angelo
007 Spaceship - Olivierdaysoul
008 Rock Wit U - Alicia Keys
009 Free Xone - Janet Jackson
010 I'm Telling You - Stee Downes 
011 Think Like A Man - Jennifer Hudson & Ne-Yo featuring Rick Ross
012 Do You Want Me (feat Schubert) - Think Twice
013 Black Rose - Hil St. Soul
014 This Song Is for You - Zhané 
015 5 Miles to Empty - Brownstone
016 Co-Star - Honey Brown
017 Rock the Boat - Aaliyah
018 Nothing On You - Tyrese
019 Tonight (Best You Ever Had) [Explicit] - John Legend ft. Ludacris
020 Survive It (feat. Roots Manuva) Ganag Panang Remix - Ghostpoet 
021 Personal Jesus - The Dixie Hummingbirds

Celebrity News Brought to You By The YBF.com
It's Your 35th Birthday Kerry Washington!
MUSIC FAB: Frank Ocean's "Voodoo"
Happy 58th Birthday Oprah!

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show w/DJ DIBOU - January 17, 2012
item.description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY to Muhammad Ali, Betty White,   Steve Harvey and First Lady Michelle Obama!!  Recorded at Gallery Galli on SugarHill January 17, 2012.... neosoul to the core!  You will find music not heard on traditional radio. New music Tuesday will showcase new music from independent artists along with your favorite neosoul, RnB and hiphop tunes ... and of course some "Celebrity News"! Visit the links ... support these independent artists!

PLAYLIST
001 Come And Get Your Love - Zascha Moktan
002 Last Chance - Brownskin
003 Touching Your Lips (feat Dj Hseres) - Eivissa Salinas
004 Official - Carlitta Durand & Vaughn Garcia
005 It's All Right - Jeff Hendrick
006 Knowingness - Leon King
007 never will i marry - Julie Dexter
008 Wondering Why? (You Don't Talk To Me) - Jill Scott
009 Stay - Ne-Yo
010 Motivation - Kelly Rowland
011 U Know What's Up - Donell Jones featuring Left-Eye
012 Betcha Wouldn't Hurt Me (Feat. Mary J. Blige, Q-Tip and Alfredo Rodriguez) - Quincy Jones
013 High Post Brotha featuring Common - Jill Scott
014 Real Talk - Dave Hollister
015 He Is - Heather Headley
016 Frankie Leg -Frankie Lons *Correction: This Keisha Cole's mother NOT Jim Jones mother
017 Joy - Blackstreet
018 The Living Proof - Mary J. Blige
019 You're The One 4 Me - D Train
020 Let The Music Play (12" Mix) - Shannon
021 He's The Greatest Dancer - Sister Sledge
022 Make That Move - Shalamar
023 Who Can I Run To? - Xscape
024 Right Here (Human Nature Radio Mix) - SWV
025 Love Changes - Jamie Foxx
026 Jesus - Le'Andria Johnson

Celebrity news brought to you by The YBF.com

48 And TOTALLY FABULOUS....Happy Birthday First Lady Michelle Obama!

Idris Elba, Octavia Spencer WIN BIG At 2012 Golden Globe Awards!

Diddy Leaving Golden Globes Afterparty With Rumored Boo Cameron Diaz!

Mama Jones DEFENDS Her Twitter BEEFS With Yandy And Olivia, Says She And Chrissy Are In A Good Place

Dwyane Wade Gets A Family Shocker At Surprise Brunch...And A Brand New CUSTOM $229K McLaren Car!

Paula Patton & Robin Thicke Owe Almost $500K In Back Taxes

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show with DJ DIBOU - January 10, 2012
item.description:
Recorded at the Music Store on SugarHill January 10, 2012.... neosoul to the core!  You will find music not heard on traditional radio. New music Tuesday will showcase new music from independent artists along with your favorite neosoul, RnB and hiphop tunes ... and of course some "Celebrity News"! Visit the links ... support these independent artists!

 

PLAYLIST

001 No Tears - Leela James
002 Missing You - Jill Scott
003 Twenty Years Later - Mint Condition
004 Shut Up - Ledisi
005 Tell Me Something Good - Lisala
006 Till Tomorrow - Jeff Bradshaw
007 7 Days - Adriana Evans
008 Freetime - Tony Momrelle
009 You (feat Dwele)  - Goapele
010 Easier Said Than Done (Radio Edit) - Rahsaan Patterson
011 Hey_Baby - Mos_Def_ft_Stephen_Marley
012 Look What You're Doin' To Me - Jazzanova
013 Survive It (feat. Roots Manuva) Ganag Panang Remix - Ghostpoet
014 Swerve...the reeping of all that is worthwhile (Noir not withstanding) - Shabazz Palaces 
015 Snakebite - Roots_Manuva
016 Cry Me A River - Justin Timberlake
017 Yours Truly (Drew Horley's Remix) - Natalie Williams
018 THE ONE (nouveau soul edit) - jaidene veda & pete mo
019 Back for More - DJ Jazzy Jeff & Ayah
020 All In My Head - Avery Sunshine
021 Shove It (feat. Spank Rock) - Santigold
022 I_Am_Your_Father - Jimmi_Jammes
023 Addictive Remix - Truth Hurts F Rakim
024 Beware of the Boys - Panjabi MC
025 Keep On Walkin'-  CeCe Peniston
026 Mocha Soul - Impromp2
027 Picture This - V
028 It's Over [Feat. Kanye West] - John Legend
029 Party Rock Anthem - Lmfao

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show with DJ DIBOU - November 29, 2011
item.description:
Recorded at Forbidden Lover's Lounge on November 29th. You will find music not heard on traditional radio. New music Tuesday will showcase new music from independent artists along with your favorite neosoul, RnB and hiphop tunes ... and of course some "Celebrity News"!

Visit the links ... support these independent artists!

item.title: NuSoul NeoSoul Show with DJ DIBOU - November 15, 2011
item.description:
NuSoul NeoSoul with DJ DIBOU recorded @ Gallery Galli on SugarHill sim in SecondLife.  Your favorite neosoul tunes ...  new CD releases by Drake, Eric Roberson, Maysa and of course some "Celebrity News"!   Host for the evening will be Charity Richez. Attire grown & sexy come as you are (see pics of Sis LCuddles & DJ SHINE).
"Haters Keep Hatin"

  

DJ SHINE - Picture by Spirit Wingtips

Event brought to you by:  Black Soul Rhythms Radio (WBSR-DR)

PLAYLIST

001 This Is Dope (feat Ebrahim)- Haezel
002 Outthebox - Lenny Hamilton
003 Run Into The Light - Maya Azucena
004 War Within (feat Ebrahim & Tingsek) - Slakah The Beatchild
005 Mr. Wrong - Mary J. Blige
006 Take Care (feat. Rhianna) - Drake 
007 Cheers (Drink To That )- Rihanna
008 Numba 1 (Tide Is High) - Kardinal Offishall
009 Too Easy (feat. Ludacris) - Tyrese
010 Only Wanna Give It To You - Elle Varner Featuring J. Cole 
011 Remedy - Leon King
012 Mister Nice Guy - Eric Roberson
013 Picture Perfect(Featuring Phonte) (Extended Version) - Eric Roberson
014 Further (feat. T3) - Eric Roberson
015 I'm Home (feat. Jay Rock) - Tyrese
016 Strong Woman - Lalah Hathaway 
017 That's Just My Way (Album Version) - Eric Benet
018 Stay Together - Ledisi
019 Lose Myself - Marsha Ambrosius 
020 Don't Kiss Me - Carl Thomas 
021 Someone Like You - Adele
022 More Than You'll Ever Know (Feat. Charlie Wilson) - Boyz II Men
023 In The Mood - Johnny Gill
024 And I'm Telling You I'm Not Going - Jennifer Hudson

DJ SHINE - Picture by Charity Richez

Celebrity News brought to you by TheYBF.com

  • Ashanti Gets Love In the Eastern Hemisphere
  • Heavy D's Family Says He Was A Great Father, Will Miss His Bear Hugs
  • DRAKE Covers Complex's December/January Issue, Reveals His Biggest Fear
